# mssql_login (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mssql_login" "example" {
  name = "example"
  password = "example"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String)
- **password** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **is_disabled** (Boolean)
- **login_type** (String)
- **sid** (String)
